review: I love it!  I wish it maintained my user sign in for Netflix, but everything else is easy.  SO nice to be able to purchase an instant video from within the "stick" instead of having to find another device to complete the purchase.  The only downside is its complete ease of use and its success at allowing me to binge watch programs.
